groups.name: harvester
groups.description: Parameters to drive the harvesting logic, formats and strategies.

properties.name: harvester.repositories
properties.description: Comma separarated list of repo URLs.

properties.name: harvester.controlled-vocabulary.csv.id-column-extractors.codice-livello.enabled
properties.description: Whether the columns should be searched for codice_n_livello columns to find the id.

properties.name: harvester.endpoint.enabled
properties.description: Whether the Rest endoints for starting and monitoring harvest jobs should be available.
